channel.title: Original on Simon Willshire
channel.description: Recent content in Original on Simon Willshire

item.title: In Tents
Hints of Spagbol
item.description: A delicious track tuned in A# F A# C G A# on Barry Shoutout to the atmospheric seagull at 1:15 Soundcloud Video

item.title: Yet Another Harmonic
item.description: Feels like it’s been a while since the last video… Here’s some more baritone improv! Tuning: A#, F, A, C, F, A Soundcloud Video

item.title: A Barry Exploratorium
item.description: Another installment of the much loved Barry improv. Tuning dropped into something a bit dreamy… Video

item.title: A Welly We Roam
item.description: Standard baritone (B to B) tuning again! This time with some standard issue Wellington wind accompaniment. Soundcloud Video

item.title: A Barry Improv
item.description: Purchased a baritone acoustic (Barry), here is a tad of improv trying it out after not able to play for a bit whilst travelling Australia and New Zealand. Tuning is dropped from baritone standard B-B to the following: A, E, A, D, E, A Soundcloud Video

item.title: A Slightly Hedges Improv
item.description: CCDGAD (Aerial Boundaries - Michael Hedges) tuning Starting to learn a famous hedges song, here is some improv in the same tuning - Maybe I’ll get around to actually covering a song sometime… Soundcloud Video

item.title: Hello Fidelity
item.description: Finally recorded something with the new recording equipment, here’s a little something I put together. Tuning as follows (Fret number to next open string): 3, 4, 12, 5, 3 Soundcloud Video

item.title: Flamencish
item.description: Some flamencish sort of improvisation - The usual process of finding a tuning, and experiment with patterns that go well together. Tuning from low to high, fret numbers indicate same note on next string: 7, 2, 7, 10, 4 Soundcloud Video

item.title: A Harmonic for Twelfth
item.description: A somewhat improvised song, mostly smacking the 12th fret harmonics. Tuning is as follows (Fret number to next string open): 7, 3, 7, 4, 3 (Basically drop D tuning with high string also D?) Soundcloud Video

item.title: Improvisation: A Tune in Another Tune
Interrupted by a Motorcycle
item.description: Interrupted by a motorcycle a minute and a half in, but here’s an odd tuning I’ve been playing on for a while! Tuning Frets (Open to adjacent below): 5, 7, 5, 4, 3 Soundcloud No video this time, sorry folks.

item.title: Something About Three Fingers
item.description: Progress towards a song I’m still working on, it seems to change everytime… Like the last video, my finger is out of comission, so 3 fingers is where its at! This time standard tuning, and a simple equilizer to cut down ambient noise. Soundcloud Video

item.title: Two Finger Improv
item.description: After a trip to New Zealand I had a finger out of commission, this has the capo and tuning to make up for that. For those of you interested, its Open-D with the 3rd and 4th strings swapped with a capo on the fifth fret. Soundcloud Video
